underlying_goal: To create a 'fast-cli' skill and configure existing logging hooks to run asynchronously, then commit the changes.
primary_success: Successfully analyzed which hooks could be made asynchronous without side effects and implemented the change correctly, then created a new skill following best practices.
brief_summary: The user wanted a new 'fast-cli' skill and to make logging hooks asynchronous. Claude created the skill file, correctly identified which hooks in settings.json were safe to make async, applied the changes, and then committed and pushed the work.
